original: intros H. apply is_series_correct in H as HIS. apply is_series_unique in HIS as HEQ. apply Series_ext with (b := fun n => if n then a 0%nat else a (S n)). -- intros n. destruct n; reflexivity. -- rewrite HEQ. simpl. apply is_series_unique.
